name: Alchemist trials
description:
Team name: XTOR(htoya) team of 3 people. 
Alexander Iskortsev - sashaoligator@gmail.com
Vladimir Prokopchuk - vova_veola@mail.ru
Lev Satonin - lev.satonin@gmail.com

Gameplay instructions: W,A,S,D to run, ctrl to slide, shift to dash, spacebar to jump and doublejump and walljump, left click to shoot, 1,2,3,4 to use skills.

Theme explanation: "As above, so below" is a reference to "Emerald tablet". Scientists interpret this as unity of Macrocosm and Microcosm. World around you changes if you changes, so there is a theme.

List any content that was created before the jam:
